summary: @feed-my-geek-soul ha risposto al tuo post “I love how we all instantly agreed on the fact that Jungkook’s wearing...” No!!! I...
body:
@feed-my-geek-soul ha risposto al tuo post “I love how we all instantly agreed on the fact that Jungkook’s wearing…”

No!!! I didn’t realize it until today! I am NOT ok! Someone come hold me. That jacket haunts my very existence! I thought that jacket era was over! And Yoongs has the nerve to take it on tour!!!! Send help plz ������

Fam, you’re the lucky winner of another headcanon of mine: Yoongi gave the jacket to Jungkook after the London concert ‘cause he’s not good with words but thought his jacket could be of some comfort for the maknae, hence why Jungkook was feeling extra fond of Yoongi in Amsterdam.

Or– Jungkook has been its rightful owner for years but either way, I’m pretty sure that 1) that’s Yoongi’s; 2) it’s not the same one Yoongi gave to Hoseok ad then Jimin.

blog.name: ao3feed-yoonkook
blog.title: From afar, I steal glances; if we touch hands, will I lose you?
blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Jeon Jungkook/Min Yoongi | Suga tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

title: screenshots
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2pVP4qC

by Lunarieen

a series of very different drabbles centered around seven very different people because I have way too many ideas and I have to do something with them

#1. Jungkook cries because he wasn’t able to perform in front of a full o2 arena. Hoseok is there to wipe his tears. [junghope]
#2. Yoongi watched Jeongguk’s video filmed during Seesaw in Berlin and calmly loses his…composure. [yoonkook]

blog.name: bulletproof-reacts
blog.title: Slightly Bangtan Obsessed
blog.description: BTS reactions, MTL, and aesthetics! Please no NSFW requests. Requests are CLOSED! xx

summary: You’re an absolute darling and I hope you know that. ❤️ I’m almost exactly 6 years younger than Yoongi (our birthdays are one...
body:
BTS reaction: falling for someone 5+ years younger

You’re an absolute darling and I hope you know that. ❤️ I’m almost exactly 6 years younger than Yoongi (our birthdays are one month and two days apart), but I’m doing this as 5+ years, to include more people. Thank you for requesting! xx

Jin/Kim Seokjin: 

I think he would be comfortable with an age gap of around five years, but if it’s getting closer to 10 years he might be uncomfortable. He would be careful with letting the person know about his feelings though, as he figures they might want someone closer to their own age, like someone from the maknae line. And I really don’t think he’s the type to ask someone out unless he knows they’re interested, especially if it’s someone he knows. Like, he’s a confident guy, but I don’t think he’d take rejection very easily.

Suga/Min Yoongi: 

He’s said it himself that age doesn’t really matter to him. And I do believe he’s the member the most comfortable with larger age gaps, like maybe up to 10-15 years, and it doesn’t really matter if they’re younger or older than him. He’d be more cautious with younger people though, as people 15 years younger than him are currently 12 years old. So at the moment age matter a bit more to him when the person is younger. But if the person is of age, or maybe becomes of age like next year, he’d be fine with it as long as you’re compatible, but younger than that and he’d move on because it’s just creepy to wait for a thirteen year old to turn legal. And when it comes to asking someone out, he needs to be friends with the person first, or at least have had a conversation with them. He’s not the type of guy who asks someone out just because they’re attractive. He needs to know that he can get along with them at least.

J-Hope/Jung Hoseok: 

I think he prefers people closer to his own age. If he does fall for someone with a larger age gap he won’t mind, but it’s gonna be a few years until he accidentally falls for someone a lot younger, as he’s still young himself, and he’s not about to fall for someone who’s like 15. So while he would prefer someone closer to his own age, he won’t really mind if you’re not, as long as you’re an adult. And while I know he wants emotional security after a rough breakup during his trainee days, I don’t think he’s opposed to asking someone he just met out. If he’s had a conversation with someone, and they seem nice, I don’t think he would see a problem with asking them out. But I also don’t think he would do that very often, because he would prefer to ask someone out if he knows they’re at least a little bit interested in him, just to avoid rejection.

RM/Kim Namjoon: 

I’m pretty sure he needs to feel a connection with someone before asking them out. Like, a good connection. And I believe he’d mostly feel that with people around his age, or at least not more than five years apart. I don’t think he particularly cares about age, he’s very much like Yoongi in that regard. I just think he has an easier time connecting to people his age. And once he’s got that connection, I don’t think he would really hesitate to ask them out. Like, if he’s too busy with his career he might not do it, but if he doesn’t feel like it’s gonna be a problem, then he’s pretty much good to go.

Jimin/Park Jimin: 

He’s another one who I feel prefer people around his own age. Especially since he’s only 23, and someone five years younger has just turned 18, and he can’t date anyone younger than that. So he might be kinda iffy about larger age gaps than that. And I don’t think he’s really gonna ask anyone out right away. Like he needs to be almost certain that they have feelings for him, because I’m sure he does what he can go avoid getting his heart broken. So he definitely needs to have known the person for a while before asking them out.

V/Kim Taehyung: 

He’s another member who I don’t think really cares about age gaps. Like, he might start to feel a bit uncomfortable if the gap is more than 10 years, and he won’t date anyone who isn’t legal, but I think that’s about it. And when it comes to asking people out I’m kinda undecided on how he’d go about it. Like, I’m pretty sure he’s like Namjoon and needs to feel connected to someone before asking them out, so he won’t ask them out just because they’re attractive. But wether he feels that connection after one conversation, or after months of knowing the person might differ. So he needs a connection before asking someone out, but I can’t say how long it’s gonna take.

Jungkook/Jeon Jeongguk: 

So, he’s said on several occasions that he perfers someone older than him. And I don’t think that has really changed. And someone 5 years younger than him would be turning 16 this year, and he’s not about to date someone under 18, probably not even under 19 tbh. And I do believe he’s less comfortable with age gaps larger than 4-5 years in general. So maybe he’d fall for someone 5 years younger in a couple of years, but I do believe it’s more likely that he’ll fall for someone closer to his age, or older. And while he’s a true romantic and probably believes that love at first sight might be a thing, he’s also very shy, so I think he’d need to know someone for a while before asking them out, even if he felt a connection to them right when he first met them.

And I do believe he’s less comfortable with age gaps larger than 4-5 years in general. So maybe he’d fall for someone 5 years younger in a couple of years, but I do believe it’s more likely that he’ll fall for someone closer to his age, or older. And while he’s a true romantic and probably believes that love at first sight might be a thing, he’s also very shy, so I think he’d need to know someone for a while before asking them out, even if he felt a connection to them right when he first met them.

trail.content_raw:
BTS reaction: falling for someone 5+ years younger

You’re an absolute darling and I hope you know that. ❤️ I’m almost exactly 6 years younger than Yoongi (our birthdays are one month and two days apart), but I’m doing this as 5+ years, to include more people. Thank you for requesting! xx

Jin/Kim Seokjin: 

I think he would be comfortable with an age gap of around five years, but if it’s getting closer to 10 years he might be uncomfortable. He would be careful with letting the person know about his feelings though, as he figures they might want someone closer to their own age, like someone from the maknae line. And I really don’t think he’s the type to ask someone out unless he knows they’re interested, especially if it’s someone he knows. Like, he’s a confident guy, but I don’t think he’d take rejection very easily.

Suga/Min Yoongi: 

He’s said it himself that age doesn’t really matter to him. And I do believe he’s the member the most comfortable with larger age gaps, like maybe up to 10-15 years, and it doesn’t really matter if they’re younger or older than him. He’d be more cautious with younger people though, as people 15 years younger than him are currently 12 years old. So at the moment age matter a bit more to him when the person is younger. But if the person is of age, or maybe becomes of age like next year, he’d be fine with it as long as you’re compatible, but younger than that and he’d move on because it’s just creepy to wait for a thirteen year old to turn legal. And when it comes to asking someone out, he needs to be friends with the person first, or at least have had a conversation with them. He’s not the type of guy who asks someone out just because they’re attractive. He needs to know that he can get along with them at least.

J-Hope/Jung Hoseok: 

I think he prefers people closer to his own age. If he does fall for someone with a larger age gap he won’t mind, but it’s gonna be a few years until he accidentally falls for someone a lot younger, as he’s still young himself, and he’s not about to fall for someone who’s like 15. So while he would prefer someone closer to his own age, he won’t really mind if you’re not, as long as you’re an adult. And while I know he wants emotional security after a rough breakup during his trainee days, I don’t think he’s opposed to asking someone he just met out. If he’s had a conversation with someone, and they seem nice, I don’t think he would see a problem with asking them out. But I also don’t think he would do that very often, because he would prefer to ask someone out if he knows they’re at least a little bit interested in him, just to avoid rejection.

RM/Kim Namjoon: 

I’m pretty sure he needs to feel a connection with someone before asking them out. Like, a good connection. And I believe he’d mostly feel that with people around his age, or at least not more than five years apart. I don’t think he particularly cares about age, he’s very much like Yoongi in that regard. I just think he has an easier time connecting to people his age. And once he’s got that connection, I don’t think he would really hesitate to ask them out. Like, if he’s too busy with his career he might not do it, but if he doesn’t feel like it’s gonna be a problem, then he’s pretty much good to go.

Jimin/Park Jimin: 

He’s another one who I feel prefer people around his own age. Especially since he’s only 23, and someone five years younger has just turned 18, and he can’t date anyone younger than that. So he might be kinda iffy about larger age gaps than that. And I don’t think he’s really gonna ask anyone out right away. Like he needs to be almost certain that they have feelings for him, because I’m sure he does what he can go avoid getting his heart broken. So he definitely needs to have known the person for a while before asking them out.

V/Kim Taehyung: 

He’s another member who I don’t think really cares about age gaps. Like, he might start to feel a bit uncomfortable if the gap is more than 10 years, and he won’t date anyone who isn’t legal, but I think that’s about it. And when it comes to asking people out I’m kinda undecided on how he’d go about it. Like, I’m pretty sure he’s like Namjoon and needs to feel connected to someone before asking them out, so he won’t ask them out just because they’re attractive. But wether he feels that connection after one conversation, or after months of knowing the person might differ. So he needs a connection before asking someone out, but I can’t say how long it’s gonna take.

Jungkook/Jeon Jeongguk: 

So, he’s said on several occasions that he perfers someone older than him. And I don’t think that has really changed. And someone 5 years younger than him would be turning 16 this year, and he’s not about to date someone under 18, probably not even under 19 tbh. And I do believe he’s less comfortable with age gaps larger than 4-5 years in general. So maybe he’d fall for someone 5 years younger in a couple of years, but I do believe it’s more likely that he’ll fall for someone closer to his age, or older. And while he’s a true romantic and probably believes that love at first sight might be a thing, he’s also very shy, so I think he’d need to know someone for a while before asking them out, even if he felt a connection to them right when he first met them.
trail.content:
BTS reaction: falling for someone 5+ years younger

You’re an absolute darling and I hope you know that. ❤️ I’m almost exactly 6 years younger than Yoongi (our birthdays are one month and two days apart), but I’m doing this as 5+ years, to include more people. Thank you for requesting! xx

tags: too much work and no play
summary:
“Can you sit with me?” Jimin asked, when Jungkook came in with a cup of ramen, extra spicy just like Jimin liked it. 

 “Do you...
text:
“Can you sit with me?” Jimin asked, when Jungkook came in with a cup of ramen, extra spicy just like Jimin liked it.

“Do you even have to ask?”

Jimin gave him a small smile and waved his phone at him.

“I’m calling home.”

“I figured.” Jungkook sighed knowing that it had to be done sooner or later.

body:
A PSA on shipping

Here is my thing with shipping idols, I get it, it’s fun. But keep that shit on Tumblr. Don’t bring it into their Vlives and don’t chant ship names at concerts. It ruins their friendships and only makes things awkward. So ya, keep that shit on Tumblr
